summary: The diff implements fixes for design mapping updates and Ready status transitions for SO/CO orders. Backend changes include a new migration module and updated order handling logic. Frontend changes focus on OrderTable mark-as-ready functionality, EditDesignModal error handling, UnmappedCodes page mutation handling, and TotalOrdersTab integration. However, several requirements are not fully evidenced in the diff, particularly the backend markOrdersReady function verification.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify the backend markOrdersReady function properly handles SO and CO order types and persists the status change
missing_requirements.reason: No markOrdersReady function is visible in the backend diff. The OrderTable component calls saveOrder directly with Ready status instead of using a dedicated markOrdersReady function. This suggests either the requirement was not implemented or the implementation approach differs from what was requested.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention adding a migration system or migration.mo file. This appears to be infrastructure work not requested in the requirements.

The BuildRequest focuses on fixing mark-as-ready functionality for SO/CO orders, not on RB order supply quantity dialogs. The dialog handling for RB orders in handleMarkAsReady was not part of the requested scope.
